org.sd.xml
Class SectionModel

java.lang.Object
  org.sd.xml.SectionModel

public class SectionModel
extends java.lang.Object

Class for building a section model around an xml (html) document.

Author:
Spence Koehler

Field Detail

DEFAULT_NON_CONSECUTIVE_TEXT_TAGS

public static final java.lang.String[] DEFAULT_NON_CONSECUTIVE_TEXT_TAGS
Text found under these tags cannot be consecutive with the next text node.

DEFAULT_HEADING_TAGS

public static final java.lang.String[] DEFAULT_HEADING_TAGS
Any text found under these tags are considered headings.

VALUE_TO_STRENGTH

public static final java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> VALUE_TO_STRENGTH
Default mappings from heading values to heading 'strength':

h h1 h2 h3 h4 h5 h6

size-N 6 5 4 3 2 1 0

size-% 200 150 120 100 80 70 60

thead th

em

strong

b

title strength 7 6 5 4 0 3 2 1

collectTextPaths

public java.util.LinkedList<SectionModel.Path> collectTextPaths(SectionModel.PathVisitor pathVisitor)
Get all of the text paths selected by the visitor.

Note: the visitor may get/set special nodes in the path and/or get/set flags in tree analyzer node info's for nodes in the tree.

tagWeight

public double tagWeight(Tree<XmlLite.Data> node,
                        java.lang.String[] tagNames,
                        boolean onlyTextPaths)
Get the weight of paths having any one of the tagNames as a proportion to all of the paths under the node. When onlyTextPaths, only consider paths that have text.

This is intended for use as a feature for identifying navigation nodes. It is generally expected that the linked ("a"-tag) text nodes will be a higher proportion of the navigation (record section) nodes than for content (record section) nodes.

textWeight

public int textWeight(Tree<XmlLite.Data> node,
                      java.lang.String[] excludeTagNames)
Get the total number of chars of text under the given node, excluding text found under the given exclusion tag(s).

This is intended for use as a feature for identifying content nodes. It is generally expected that the non-linked ("a"-tag) textWeight of content (record section) nodes will be greater than that of navigation (record section) nodes.

getModelStats

public SectionModel.ModelStats getModelStats()
